author: Dennis S
text:
Southern Bench of Nation Green Tribunal (NGT) here has directed Public Works Department and Madurai Corporation not to allow throwing of garbage or debris in the 83-km-long Kiruthumal channel flowing through four southern districts and to remove existing garbage for a free flow of water.

The Bench, comprising Justice P. Jyothimani and expert member R. Nagendran, made the observation on an application by N. Alagumuthu Velayudam Pillai of Thiruppalai, who sought a direction to authorities to maintain Kiruthumal channel free from pollution and encroachments, and constitution of a high-level committee to monitor the channel and submit periodical reports.

Madurai Corporation, in its reply, had stated that a detailed project report (DPR) was to be prepared for desilting and lining the channel within its limits.
title: NGT orders removal of debris from Kiruthumal channel
